Method Detail

putVariable

void putVariable(java.lang.String key,
                 java.lang.Object value)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                        MeasurementRunningException
Adds a key value pair to the script engine, so that a variable with the name can be used in the script.

Parameters:
key - Name of variable to be used in script.
value - Value of the variable.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
MeasurementRunningException

setScriptEngine

void setScriptEngine(RemoteScriptEngine engine)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Sets the script engine with which the scripts should be evaluated. Normally only necessary if the script engine should not be searched for automatically on the server side.

Parameters:
engine - The script engine to use.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
